Game: Let's Yoga! 2007-07-05T00:00:00-07:00 Let's Yoga (どこでもヨガ, Doko Demo Yoga) is a fitness video game developed by Vanpool and published by Konami for the Nintendo DS. It was released in Japan on July 5, 2007, Europe on November 16, 2007, and in North America on April 29, 2008. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/5ff83413-5d3d-4b46-8f37-e4c89c092d9d.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/4e7b4300-b6ab-442e-93b2-d1c7a932a7cf.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/c34b7e44-b506-4c68-83b6-b5e887016393.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/0f627e01-b3c5-40f0-a508-16d0695d921e.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Let%27s_Yoga Action Vanpool Konami
